title: Монастырь
overview: Maria is a charming party girl who lives at the expense of others. Once in the Emirates, she goes to a nightclub with the wife of a billionaire, the party gets out of hand, and now Maria is facing prison, dangerous people are chasing her, and her accounts are blocked. She has to flee to Russia, but she is not safe at home either - and the girl takes refuge in the walls of the monastery.
